title: Covid widened the gender gap — it will now take 135 years to close that divide, WEF says
content:
1. Covid widened the gender gap — it will now take 135 years to close that divide, WEF says  CNBC
  2. US ranks 30, India slips to 140th position in Global Gender Gap report |Women equality |English News  WION
  3. The pandemic has had a 'massive impact' on the gender gap: WEF  CNBC International TV
  4. 'We need positive action:' 49 women ambassadors speak out for equality as part of recovery from pandemic  USA TODAY
  5. This is a watershed moment for gender equality: If companies act now  World Economic Forum
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: WEF表示，Covid扩大了性别差距--现在需要135年才能缩小这一差距。
WEF表示，Covid擴大了性別差距--現在需要135年才能縮小這一差距。
WEFの発表によると、Covidによって拡大した男女間の格差は、今後135年かけて解消されることになる。
